title: 820-00840   Smoked CDCD3215C ic's
message:
U3200 had a small hole in it.    I replaced both the CD3215's 
I checked for CPU shorts and did not find any.
3.42v is present at the CD3215's

PP3V42 is present
current draw is real low.  0.02A

I am a little green with these boards.    
Am I probably looking at a smoked CPU?

title: 820-00840   Smoked CDCD3215C ic's
message: Do you have 20v on charger? Voltage on PPBUS?

title: 820-00840   Smoked CDCD3215C ic's
message: NO.   The CD3215's are not firing it up

title: 820-00840   Smoked CDCD3215C ic's
message: 20v is not only related to CD3215 controllers. Check their LDO's, also check voltages around U7000.

title: 820-00840   Smoked CDCD3215C ic's
message:
Do you get any voltage at PPBUS_G3H?

Inspect USB redriver chip from opposite side; many times dies too, if a CD3215 chip is blown.
